mapper.select: /*code.codeList*/ SELECT CODETYPE ,CODEDESC ,TOTALCNT FROM ( SELECT CODETYPE ,CODEDESC ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY CODETYPE) AS NUMROW ,COUNT(*) OVER() AS TOTALCNT FROM CODE ) WHERE NUMROW BETWEEN (#{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*10 + 1 AND #{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC}*10

/*code.comcodeList*/ SELECT CODEID ,CODETYPE ,CODENAME ,CODECOMMENT ,TOTALCNT FROM ( SELECT CODEID ,CODETYPE ,CODENAME ,nvl(CODECOMMENT,' ') as CODECOMMENT ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY CODEID) AS NUMROW ,COUNT(*) OVER() AS TOTALCNT FROM COMCODE WHERE CODETYPE = #{codeType} ORDER BY CODEID ) WHERE NUMROW BETWEEN (#{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*10 + 1 AND #{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC}*10
/*code.comcodeList1*/ SELECT * FROM COMCODE WHERE CODETYPE = #{codeType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
/*code.codeTotal*/ SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_CNT FROM CODE
/*code.comcodeTotal*/ SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_CNT FROM COMCODE WHERE CODETYPE = #{codeType}
/*code.selectAlltype*/ SELECT * FROM CODE WHERE CODETYPE = 'sedan' or CODETYPE = 'eco' or CODETYPE = 'rv' or CODETYPE = 'taxi' or CODETYPE = 'truck'
/*code.selectAllCar*/ SELECT * FROM COMCODE WHERE CODETYPE = 'sedan' or CODETYPE = 'eco' or CODETYPE = 'rv' or CODETYPE = 'taxi' or CODETYPE = 'truck' and CODETYPE = #{codeType}
